value.description: POPUP_TOURNAMENT_FORMATION_DESC_0
POPUP_TOURNAMENT_FORMATION_DESC_1
POPUP_TOURNAMENT_FORMATION_DESC_2
POPUP_TOURNAMENT_FORMATION_DESC_3

value.text: you can do stuff for level 1
you can do stuff for level 2
you can do stuff for level 3
you can do stuff for level 4
you can do stuff for level 5

_TITLE: AcidCaos - Goal fixes - I don't think this is necessary????

value.description: Farmland can provide food for your empire. Go to the shop to buy a farmland and place it near the town hall!
value.title: Establishing farmland

value.description: You need farmers to gather resources. Click your town hall, then click TRAIN in the button panel at the bottom.
value.title: Recruit farmers

value.description: Your farmland needs farmers to produce food. First, click a villager, then click the farmland.
value.title: Place farmers on farmland

value.description: When the food is ripe, an icon will appear. Click it to gain resources!
value.title: Gather food

value.description: You'll get food, but you'll also need wood. Click a villager, then click a tree. The villager will automatically cut down all surrounding trees!
value.title: Chop trees for wood

value.description: Rotate your mouse wheel or click and drag the slider in the lower right corner of the screen to zoom in/out. This will help you spot buildings or units!
value.title: Move (mouse wheel to zoom)

value.description: Farm plots are essential for increasing your empire's resources because they provide you with food. Go to BUILD > Buildings > Resources and select to build farm plots.
value.title: Build a farm plot

value.description: Villagers and warriors live in houses! The more houses you build, the more units you can train. Go to BUILD > Buildings > Houses and select to build a house.
value.title: Build a house

value.description: You'll need an army for the coming battles! Click the "Build" button, select the "Attack" category, and finally click the Barracks building.
value.title: Build a barracks

value.description: Start building your army by recruiting some spearmen. Click the Barracks building, then click the Train button in the lower panel. Repeat three times.
value.title: Recruit 3 spearmen

value.description: At the Town Hall, click the Cart button in the lower panel. Do this twice to train two villagers.
value.title: Recruit 2 farmers

value.description: A mill will provide you with food, just like farmland. Go to Construction > Buildings > Resources to build a mill.
value.title: Build a mill

value.description: Mills don't work alone! They need farmers. Select a farmer and click the mill to place him.
value.title: Place farmers on the mill

value.description: Select an option and the quantity you would like to start production.
value.title: Select working hours

value.description: Increase your food intake by adding another farmer to the mill! (If you don't have any farmers available, you can train them at the Town Hall.)
value.title: Place another farmer on the mill

value.description: If you don't have any resources, training farmers will help you build your own. Click your mill, then click a villager portrait to get your farmer.
value.title: Remove farmers from the mill

value.description: Gold makes you stronger! It's used to train the best units. Select a villager and click a gold vein (explore the map to find gold veins).
value.title: Collect 3 gold

value.description: Double-click once to select three and place them near the Town Hall fountain. Double-clicking is very useful!
value.title: Select double-click

value.description: Click the square tool in the lower right corner, then click and drag to select units. (You can also use <Space>, it's easier and faster!) Then attack 3 trolls.
value.title: Kill 3 trolls

value.description: Sheep are fun... and delicious! But they need a pasture! Build one by going to Build > Building > Resources. It will provide you with some food!
value.title: Build a sheep pasture

value.description: Okay. If you already have a pasture, go get some sheep now. Select a villager and click a sheep to catch it.
value.title: Capture sheep

value.description: If you've already captured a sheep, select it and send it to the pasture!
value.title: Place sheep on pasture

value.description: When a sheep pasture is ready to be collected (you'll see a food icon), click on it!
value.title: Collect sheep pasture

value.description: Build 3 farm plots of land to feed your soldiers! Remember that you can train your Town Hall villagers directly to their farms, producing more food at the same time.
value.title: Build 3 farm plots

value.description: Collect 5 farm plots of land. Important: Farm plots require wood to be rebuilt, so always have some in your inventory (see stats in the top left corner of the screen).
value.title: Collect 5 farm plots

value.description: Build 4 houses to increase the population cap. (Build > Building > Houses)
value.title: Build 4 houses

value.description: Gold can also be obtained through gold mines; you can build one. Go to Building > Resources and build it!
value.title: Build a gold mine

value.description: Gold mines require farmers to extract gold. Place them in one of the gold mines (if you don't have any farmers, remember to recruit them at Town Hall).
value.title: Place farmers on the gold mine

value.description: Archery will allow you to recruit archer infantry. Archers have a longer attack range than regular infantry. You can find the Archery Barracks in the Shop.
value.title: Build an archery barracks

value.description: Recruit 3 Archers at the Archery Barracks! Remember to click the TRAIN button at the bottom.
value.title: Recruit 3 archers

value.description: It's time to fight the trolls! Select your units using the selection tool in the bottom right corner or double-click. Then click on an evil troll to attack it!
value.title: Kill 5 or more trolls

value.description: This isn't just about fighting! Add some decorations to your empire to make it even more beautiful! Go to the Shop and choose 5 decorations!
value.title: Build 5 decorations

value.description: Every empire has a name! But don't make it too long! Click your empire's name in the top right corner.
value.title: Set your empire's name

value.description: Click a villager and then click a tree to start collecting. If the tree is near a group of trees, the villager will automatically collect them all!
value.title: Chop 10 trees

value.description: Stone is very important for building defensive structures! Have your villagers collect 10 stones!
value.title: Gather 10 stones

value.description: Build two towers near the Town Hall to protect your empire from enemy invasions. This is your most important building! (BUILD > Defense)
value.title: Build 2 towers near the town hall

value.description: Build a defensive wall of 20 units. Go to the shop and select Defense.
value.title: Build a wall

value.description: Use the Move tool in the panel to move the wall (directional cross icon).
value.title: Move a wall

value.description: Your army needs cavalry! Build a stable to train light cavalry (BUILD > Attack).
value.title: Build a stable

value.description: You need more warriors for your first battle! Train three knights in the stable!
value.title: Train 3 knights

value.description: Use the Marquee Selection tool in the panel below to do this, or use the spacebar.
value.title: Select units with the marquee tool

value.description: Kill all the trolls! You can see them scattered around the map. Let's get started, for our empire!
value.title: Kill all trolls

value.description: When you've killed all the trolls, the princess will be free!
value.title: Save the princess!

value.description: Click on the portrait #0# in the bottom panel to see how beautiful other empires are!
value.title: Visit #0#!

value.description: Build a lumber mill and place a villager there to start producing lumber! (BUILD > Buildings > Resources).
value.title: Build a lumber mill and place a farmer there.

value.description: Choose a working time; the amount of lumber produced varies depending on the time.
value.title: Choose a working time.

value.description: To increase speed, add another villager. (If no villagers are available, train them at the Town Hall.)
value.title: Place another villager at the lumber mill.

value.description: Build a dairy farm (BUILD > Buildings > Resources)
value.title: Build a cow pasture.

value.description: Putting cows in the farm will produce food.
value.title: Place a cow at the pasture.

value.description: Build a market to buy and sell resources! (BUILD > Buildings > Miscellaneous)
value.title: Build a market.

value.description: To open the market, recruit friends to join!
value.title: Recruit a friend to the market.

value.description: Banknotes are useful for purchasing units, buildings, and gifts!
value.title: Spend 1 banknote.

value.description: Once you have a certain number of friends, you can successfully unlock it!
value.title: Open the market.

value.description: Click the icon in the lower right corner of the panel, then click the trophy icon. Completing these collections will earn you unique warriors and gifts!
value.title: Check the collection.

value.description: Play for 3 consecutive days and click the Daily Bonus Bag on the right side of the screen to receive extra gold!
value.title: Get a daily bonus for 3 consecutive days.

value.description: Reach 40 population and your empire will begin to expand!
value.title: Reach 40 population.

value.description: Obtain 10 gold veins; you'll need them soon!
value.title: Harvest 10 gold mines.

value.description: Building stone is essential for defensive structures. Build a stone mine to start producing this resource! (BUILD > Buildings > Resources)
value.title: Build a stone mine.

value.description: Attacking other players provides much gold and xp! Click on the WORLD icon (blue) at the top, then click on the Attack button of a player. Read the Battle Help before starting!
value.title: Attack 1 player.

value.description: Click on the WORLD button (blue icon on top right) and then click on the OPTIONS button at the top of the screen. Select the 'My defensive strategy' button and choose your units behavior.
value.title: Defense strategy.

value.description: Collect food from the mill.
value.title: Collect food from the mill.

value.description: Collect wood from the lumber mill.
value.title: Collect lumber mills.

value.description: Collect resources from the stone mine.
value.title: Collect stone mines.

value.description: Collect gold from the gold mine!
value.title: Collect gold mines.

value.description: Get 200 units of stone at the market. Click to enter the market to trade!
value.title: Get 200 stone units from the market.

value.description: Get 100 wood at the market. Click to enter the market to trade!
value.title: Get 100 wood units from the market.

value.description: Click on the WORLD word in one of your friends portrait (if you can't see it, first click on the Assist word and come back to your empire) and attack him. For once he'll forgive you! =P
value.title: Attack 1 friend!

value.description: Click on the WORLD button (blue) and then click on the BATTLE RESULTS button at the top of the screen. Then check your attacks and who attacked you!
value.title: Check Attacks

value.description: The second-level house can accommodate more people. First select house I, click the UPGRADE button in the panel below, and you can upgrade it!
value.title: Build a secondary house

value.description: Select an item and click the Favorite button below to add it to your collection.
value.title: Items placed in the collection room

value.description: Eagles allow you to spy your enemy before attacking him! Build one and hire friends to open it! (BUILD > Buildings > Miscellaneous)
value.title: Build/Open Eagles I

value.description: Sell ​​100 units of wood in the market. Click the Sell button to receive gold!
value.title: Sell ​​100 units of wood

value.description: Click the Expand Map button to expand.
value.title: Expand the map

value.description: Build a workshop I to build rams and be able to destroy doors of enemies' fortifications (BUILD > Attack).
value.title: Build Workshop I

value.description: Free the 3 archers kidnapped by trolls! (daily mission)
value.title: Free 3 archers

value.description: Kill 5 Devious Trolls. They are implied in the complot to destroy your empire!
value.title: Kill 5 Devious trolls

value.description: Send 5 archers to attack the same tower, and afterwards send your melee units against the same tower!
value.title: Coordinated Attack

value.description: Click on the world icon at the upper part and then on the SPY button on any player to spy his empire!
value.title: Use Eagle

value.description: Defeat two players (including your friends!) to get gold... and glory!
value.title: Defeat two players

value.description: Build a Harbor (Buildings > Miscellaneous), invite your friends and click on the OPEN button to explore the seas!
value.title: Build Harbor

value.description: Once your Harbor is open, click on it and then press the Let's Sail button to see the map!
value.title: Check the map

value.description: Use the Harbor to travel to Mysterious Isle and retrieve the treasure that the trolls stole to your ancestors! Complete Mysterious Island (1 star).
value.title: Complete Mysterious Isle on 1 star

value.description: Upgrade your Barracks II to train stronger units! (Buildings > Attack or UPGRADE button in Barracks I interface)
value.title: Upgrade Barracks II

value.description: Train 3 Swordsmen in your Barracks II... you'll need them soon!
value.title: Train 3 Swordsmen

value.description: Access the map in another way: click on the world icon on top and then click on the ship surrounding the island.
value.title: Sail in another way

value.description: Unknown Isle is a cold, hostile place, but in the loot that the Ravager Trolls protect lies hidden a nice amount of gold! Complete Unknown Isle (1 star).
value.title: Complete Unknown Isle (1 star)

value.description: Build two Tower II in your empire. You will get rid of enemies faster! (BUILD > Defense)
value.title: Build 2 tower II

value.description: Build 20 Wall II in the lower left row of your 1st acre  (BUILD > Defense). You can also upgrade the Wall I you already have if you click on one wall and then click UPGRADE on the lower interface.
value.title: Build 20 Wall II

value.description: Build 2 Pumpkin Crop to obtain more food.
value.title: Build 2 Pumpkin Crop

value.description: Build an Allies Building and get 9 allies to open it!
value.title: Invoke allies

value.description: Upgrade you Archery to train better archers! (Buildings > Attack)
value.title: Upgrade to Archery II

value.description: Train 8 Medium Archer... the danger is imminent!
value.title: Train 8 Medium Archer

value.description: The trolls have kidnapped some soldiers! Free them! (daily mission)
value.title: Rescue Kidnapped Soldiers

value.description: Prove yourself and defeat 3 players... including your friends!
value.title: Defeat 3 players

value.description: Build the Mill II to increase food production.
value.title: Build Mill II

value.description: Recruit 6 friends to open the mill.
value.title: Recruit 6 friends for Mill II

value.description: Hire all villagers in your new mill to take full advantage of it!
value.title: Hire all villagers in Mill II

value.description: Leave the mill collecting for 8 hours.
value.title: 8 hours Mill

value.description: Upgrade your Market to Market II to buy or sell more resources.
value.title: Upgrade Market

value.description: Build 8 towers in your empire... the trolls will attack soon and you must protect yourself!
value.title: Build 8 towers

value.description: If the trolls set fire to buildings of your empire, click on a villager and then click again on the fire to extinguish it!
value.title: Extinguish fire

value.description: Visit a friend and help him to collect as many resources as you can!
value.title: Help a friend

value.description: Build a Prize building and get allies to obtain fabulous special units! (Buildings > Miscellaneous)
value.title: Build Prize Building

value.description: Tell 3 friends to help you get a fantastic special unit on your Prize Building!
value.title: Get recruitment prize

value.description: Build the Training Stables to improve the mobility of your units!
value.title: Build Traning Stables

value.description: Capture a horse with a villager or warrior and take it to the Training Stables.
value.title: Capture a horse and...

value.description: Once you have put a horse, lead a Swordsman to the Training Stables to turn him into a medium knight!
value.title: Lead Swordsman to Stables...

value.description: Complete Mysterious Isle on 2 stars to obtain much more gold and XP!
value.title: Complete Mysterious Isle (2 stars)

value.description: Upgrade your Town Hall. Select it and click on UPGRADE at the bottom part of the interface.
value.title: Upgrade Town Hall

value.description: Train 2 villagers in your new Town Hall. Now they will run as fast as a hare!
value.title: Train 2 villagers

value.description: Upgrade Stables to Stables II to train heavier mounted units!
value.title: Upgrade Stables

value.description: Train 3 Medium Knights... You're getting stronger every day!
value.title: Train 3 Medium Knights

value.description: Get the Treasure Chest, defended by the trolls! (Daily mission)
value.title: Get Treasure Chest!

value.description: Build the Allies Market so your friends can send you free resources! (Buildings > Miscellaneous)
value.title: Build Allies Market

value.description: Tell your friends to help you and get at least 500 units of wood in the allies market!
value.title: Get wood Allies Market

value.description: Discover the secrets of the Undiscovered Isle (1 star). Beware of the evil skeletons!
value.title: Undiscovered Isle (1 star)

value.description: The more gold the better! Build a Gold Mine II to increase the production.
value.title: Build Gold Mine II

value.description: Take the most out of the Gold Mine II adding 4 villagers to it.
value.title: Put 4 villagers in Gold Mine II

value.description: Need help to complete the collections? Build a Treasure Mine to get one item EACH DAY!
value.title: Build Treasure Mine

value.description: Collect the surprise item in the Treasure Mine (lapse of 24h. since the last picked up gift).
value.title: Collect object in Treasure Mine

value.description: Build a Workshop II to enjoy a high damage weapon: scorpions! (BUILD > Attack)
value.title: Build Workshop II

value.description: Tell your friends to help you open the Workshop II... scorpions wreak havoc against enemy towers!
value.title: Open Workshop II

value.description: Build 3 scorpions in the Workshop II and get ready for the last stage of the process!
value.title: Build 3 Scorpions

value.description: When the next troll camp appears, destroy one tower with a group of 3 Scorpions... notice that weak enemy towers don't have enough range to destroy your scorpions!
value.title: Destroy 1 tower with Scorpions

value.description: Build a Tower III to protect yourself better against incoming attacks!
value.title: Build Tower III

value.description: Build an Altar of Heroes to purchase powerful special units!
value.title: Build Altar of Heroes

value.description: Get a hero in the Altar of Heroes to help you defeat your enemies more easily! (Click on the GET HERO button)
value.title: Get a hero

value.description: Kill an Axethrower. These depictable beings won't hesitate to kill your units from the distance!
value.title: Kill Axethrower

value.description: Rescue the villagers captured by trolls! They would do the same for you! (daily mission)
value.title: Rescue villagers

value.description: Play 5 days in a row and get your special unit. To put your hero on the map, go to BUILD > STORAGE.
value.title: Put a hero on your map

value.description: Go to Arctic Isle (1 star) and save the penguins... Beware, a big beast is waiting for you!
value.title: Save the penguins!

value.description: Fight against two players from your same level and show up your skills! you don't need to win, but must finish the combat!
value.title: Fight against two player from your same level

value.description: Build a Lumber Mill II to produce more wood!
value.title: Build Lumber Mill II

value.description: Put 4 villagers into the Lumber Mill II to increase its production outcome!
value.title: Put 4 villager into Lumber Mill II

value.description: Build a Small Refuge and before logging out put in 2 of your most valuable units so other players don't destroy them!
value.title: Build Small Refuge

value.description: Invoke heavenly powers and build a Big Church to raise your population limit. (BUILD > Wonders)
value.title: Build Big Church

value.description: Trolls hid more treasures yet, and this time they have doubled its number to protect it! Complete Unknown Isle on 2 stars!
value.title: More Ravager Trolls!

value.description: Build a Barracks III to train the renowned Long Swordsman!
value.title: Build Barracks III

value.description: Train 3 Long Swordsman, they will help you defeat your enemies more quickly!
value.title: Train 3 Long Swordsman

value.description: Upgrade to Eagles II so your eagles have more life and can explore more enemy terrain!
value.title: Upgrade to Eagles II

value.description: Build a Heroes Grave to have the chance of resurrecting your lost special units!
value.title: Build Heroes Grave

value.description: Liberate the Prisoner Troll. He never bent his knee against the evil behavior of his tribe and has always tried to be a good troll!
value.title: Liberate Prisoner Troll

value.description: Kill 1 Boar Rider! This mounted beast won't dare to kill your fighters when you are not watching!
value.title: Kill 1 Boar Rider

value.description: Complete Mysterious Isle on 3 stars and defeat all the evil trolls!
value.title: Thrice Trolls!

value.description: Build a Stone Mine II to keep producing more stone for the welfare of your Empire!
value.title: Build Stone Mine II

value.description: Build 20 Wall III in the bottom left row or upgrade your current walls there. This way your enemies will have a hard time trying to put their foot on your empire!
value.title: Build 20 Wall III

value.description: Build Cow Ranch II... if the meat is tasty now, it will be tastier with this improvement!
value.title: Build Cow Ranch II

value.description: Lead a cow to the ranch to get a good portion of food!
value.title: Lead a cow to ranch

value.description: Build a Round Table so your allies can help you getting incredible bonuses!
value.title: Build Round Table

value.description: Recruit 4 allies to the Round Table to get the first prize!
value.title: Put 4 allies to Round Table

value.description: Destroy 2 Troll Towers III and let those ugly beasts know who rules this empire!!
value.title: Destroy 2 Troll Towers III

value.description: Prince Arthur has been kidnapped by evil trolls! Save him before it's too late!
value.title: Rescue Prince Arthur!

value.description: Build an Archery III to train lethal Heavy Archers!
value.title: Build Archery II

value.description: Train 3 heavy archers. You'll be more dreaded by your enemies!
value.title: Train 3 heavy archers

value.description: Build a Temple to obtain more gold resources!
value.title: Build Temple

value.description: Trolls conquered this island and killed all its human dwellers. Avenge your ancestors and conquer Emergent Isle (1 star)!!
value.title: Avenge Ancestors

value.description: Update 4 House I to House II to put more citizens in!
value.title: Update House II

value.description: Expand 3 acres
value.title: Expand 3 acres

value.description: Open a Church so you can train healers!
value.title: Open Church

value.description: Train 3 healers so they can heal your units during the combat!
value.title: Train 3 healers

value.description: Attack 2 players of more level than yours and show them who's the best!
value.title: Attack 2 player more level

value.description: Trolls have cut the water supply! Kill them to retrieve control of the wells!
value.title: Free the wells

value.description: Build a Stable III to be able to train the dreaded heavy knights!
value.title: Build Stable III

value.description: Save the captive healers from trolls' hands! They will join your army afterwards!
value.title: Save Healers

value.description: Visit Misty Isle (1 star) and destroy the Town Hall of your Viking enemies before they come to conquer your land!
value.title: Complete Misty Isle on 1 star

value.description: Visit Unknown Isle (3 stars) and let Ravager Trolls know who has the power!
value.title: Complete Unknown Isle 3 stars

value.description: Build 3 eggplant farms to increase your food outcome!
value.title: Build 3 eggplant farms

value.description: Build 1 wall door so your units can come in and out of your empire easily and securely!
value.title: Build 1 wall door

value.description: Build an Academy (Buildings > Investigation) to train your villagers to go faster and pile up more resources to gather!
value.title: Build Academy

value.description: Build a Workshop III to be able to build destructive catapults!
value.title: Build workshop III

value.description: Build a sacrifice altar and sacrifice a unit to get part of the resources back to your inventory.
value.title: Sacrifice unit

value.description: Free the 4 stone mines from trolls control! This resource is basic for your survival! (daily mission)
value.title: Free 4 stone mines!

value.description: Visit the Undiscovered Isle (2 stars) and kill all the skeletons that have spawned to end with the undead menace!
value.title: Complete Undiscovered Isle 2 stars

value.description: Build a Mill III to increase your food outcome even more!
value.title: Build Mill III

value.description: Build 2 Tower IV to destroy your enemies almost with no hassles!
value.title: Build 2 Tower IV

value.description: Open a Cathedral to train hypnotist monks! They are very powerful!
value.title: Open Cathedral

value.description: Convert an enemy using a monk. Afterwards you can control that enemy for your purposes!
value.title: Convert enemy with a monk

value.description: Build a Nursery to help animals to breed.
value.title: Build Nursery

value.description: Put 2 horses inside and wait for getting your new horse! You can produce as many as you need!
value.title: Put 2 horses inside

value.description: Visit Dune Isle (1 star) and destroy the Golden Hall where the treacherous Mummy lives. Take care with Anubis servants!
value.title: Complete Dune Isle on 1 star

value.description: Build a Gold Mine III to increase your gold resources!
value.title: Build Gold Mine III

value.description: Put 6 villagers inside your new gold mine to make it work at its fullest.
value.title: Put 6 villagers inside

value.description: Build Archery Stables to train medium archer knights!
value.title: Build Archery Stables

value.description: Train 2 Archer Knights to increase the speed of your range units!
value.title: Build 2 Archer Knight

value.description: Rescue the captured allies by the trolls before they kill them!
value.title: Rescue the captured allies

value.description: Build a Zeppelin Tower to fly over the Eastern Sea and visit more isles!!
value.title: Build a Zeppelin Tower

value.description: Update Town Hall to Town Hall III. Your villagers will go as faster as the best runner!
value.title: Update Town Hall to Town Hall III

value.description: Train 2 villagers III and try their super speed
value.title: Train 2 villagers III

value.description: Update the Market to Market III to deal with more resources with each transaction.
value.title: Update the Market to Market III

value.description: Build 10 walls IV on the left bottom row of your empire 1rst acre.
value.title: Build 10 walls IV

value.description: Visit the Arctic Isle (2 stars) and pay a visit to your \'friend\' the Yeti to save the penguins… take care, he has called for help!
value.title: Complete Arctic Isle 2 stars

value.description: Free the animals closed in the cage, they are suffering!
value.title: Free the captured animals

value.description: Build the Workshop IV to be able to build cannons! Woo hoo!!
value.title: Build Workshop IV

value.description: Train 3 cannons... and try them on your enemies when you wish!
value.title: Train 3 cannons

value.description: Build the Healing Spring and heal a damaged unit after a battle. This tree is miraculous!
value.title: Heal a damaged unit.

value.description: Build a Cow Ranch III to increase your food outcome. Cows won't like it, but your empire's survival depends on it!!
value.title: Build a Cow Ranch III

value.description: Build a Lumber Mill III to increase your wood outcome!
value.title: Build a Lumber Mill III

value.description: Visit the Emergent Isle (2 stars) and try to get the treasure protected by the trolls. Beware, now they are much more dangerous!
value.title: Complete the Emergent Isle 2 stars

value.description: Build a Barracks IV to train Powerful Swordsmen! Your enemies will be terrified now!
value.title: Build Barracks IV

value.description: Train 3 swordsmen IV and show your enemies some sword skill lessons!
value.title: Train 3 swordsmen IV

value.description: Build 2 carrot farms to increase your food outcome. Your warriors are not rabbits, but they also like carrots!
value.title: Build 2 carrot farms

value.description: Build a Forestry Academy and your villagers will cut trees faster than any professional woodcutter!
value.title: Build Forestry Academy

value.description: Open a Stone Mine III to increase your stone resources.
value.title: Open a Stone Mine III

value.description: Build a Mechanics building. You can train Engineers to repair siege weapons!
value.title: Build Mechanics

value.description: Free the Siege Weapons seized by the trolls! Why the hell they steal them if they don't know how to use them?
value.title: Free the Siege Weapons!

value.description: Build an Archery IV to train Powerful Archers. If you started to be dreaded by your enemies, many will now run away from you!
value.title: Build Archery IV

value.description: Train 3 Powerful Archers and let them know how piercing are your new arrows!
value.title: Train 3 Powerful Archers

value.description: Build an Eagles III to breed stronger eagles!
value.title: Build Eagles III

value.description: Explore the Skeleton Statue and discover its hidden secret! (daily mission)
value.title: Explore the Skeleton Statue

value.description: Visit the Desert Isle (1 star) and kill all the trolls. Beware, a great peril looms under the sands...
value.title: Complete the Desert Isle on 1 star

value.description: Build a House IV to be able to put more population in.
value.title: Build House IV

value.description: Open a Fire Workshop to be able to build fire cannons! Super Whoo Hoo!
value.title: Open a Fire Workshop

value.description: Build a Minery Academy so your villager learn to collect gold and stone faster.
value.title: Build Minery Academy

value.description: Open a Mill IV to increase your food outcome. Your warriors are always hungry!
value.title: Open Mill IV

value.description: Build a Stables IV to train Powerful Knights. You are now stronger than ever!
value.title: Build Stables IV

value.description: Train 3 Powerful Knights and invite your enemies to eat dust!
value.title: Train 3 Knights

value.description: Build a Blacksmith so melee, ranged and mounted troops spend less resources to be trained! That's really good news!!
value.title: Build a Blacksmith

value.description: Build 5 Towers IV to improve your empire defenses. Put them strategically and they will badly hurt your enemies, promised!
value.title: Build 5 Towers IV

value.description: Build 10 Walls V on the lower left row of your empire to improve you defensive structures.
value.title: Build 10 Walls V

value.description: Build a Weather Machine to be able to change the landscape at your will! That's magic, baby!!
value.title: Build a Weather Machine

value.description: Build 2 watermelon Farms to increase your food outcome. Eating fruit is very healthy, but you already know that!
value.title: Build 2 watermelon Farms

value.description: Update the Town Hall IV. If your villagers were really fast, now they will almost fly!
value.title: Update Town Hall IV

value.description: Build a Lumber Mill IV to increase your wood outcome.
value.title: Build Lumber Mill IV

value.description: Build a Tavern and you'll increase your maximum population capacity by 10 units... people that go to the Tavern don't need any home to live in!
value.title: Build the Tavern

value.description: Build the Wizardry Academy to be able to cast spells! The power to destroy that the Spell Book gives you is immeasurable! (You'll see the Spell Book in your next game session)
value.title: Build Wizardry Academy!

value.description: Expand the territory of your empire to 4 acres and show who the real king of Social Empires is!
value.title: Expand to 4 acres

value.description: Visit Nest Isle (1 star) and defeat the Furious Dragon! Take care, is very powerful!
value.title: Defeat the Dragon!

value.description: Click on the Dragon Breeding Nest,  and click again on the ENTER button at the lower interface. Now press the 'Take Care' button to take care of the Dragon Egg!
value.title: Take care of the Dragon Egg!
